text: Funding Trump’s unrealistic border wall would be a gross misuse of taxpayer money.

"The caged bird sings   
with a fearful trill   
of things unknown   
but longed for still   
and his tune is heard   
on the distant hill   
for the caged bird   
sings of freedom.”
 
– Maya Angelou
